title: Omnes with out the rounded terminals.
content:
I'm looking for suggestions for a typeface similar to "Omnes" by Josh Darden but without the rounded terminals. Must be a very complete set—heavy through thin and italics. Thank you!

Reference:  
 [http://www.dardenstudio.com/assets/pdf/omnes.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419095929/http:/www.dardenstudio.com/assets/pdf/omnes.pdf "http://www.dardenstudio.com/assets/pdf/omnes.pdf")
author: benbilow

comments.content:
Depending on what it is that you're finding in Omnes that you want to reflect, you might choose from:

Gotham  
Helvetica  
Arial (\*gasp\*) or  
National

Or if you've got deep pockets, you might try commissioning a non-rounded version from Joshua himself.
Take a look at some of the suggestions at [Identifont](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419095929/http:/www.identifont.com/similar?JB6).
why didn't i think of Freight Sans? duh!
Thank you much. Great suggestions. After some debate... Gotham it is!
